Notes: [optional] for the credits section on GitHub

Croatian: Informacije o tim postavkama možete pronaći u README
English: You can find information for these settings in the README
German: Informationen zu diesen Einstellungen findest du in der README

Croatian: Lagano aktivan (lagana vježba 1-3 dana u tjednu)
English: Lightly Active (light exercise 1-3 days per week)
German: Leicht aktiv (leichte Belastung 1-3 Tage pro Woche)

English: Moderately Active (moderate exercise 3-5 days per week)
German: Durchschnittlich aktiv (mittlere Belastung 3-5 Tage pro Woche)

Croatian: Vrlo aktivan (naporna vježba 6-7 dana u tjednu)
English: Very Active (hard exercise 6-7 days per week)
German: Sehr aktiv (harte Belastung 6-7 Tage pro Woche)

Croatian: Posebno aktivan (vrlo naporan / sportski ili fizički rad)
English: Extra Active (very hard exercise/training or a physical job)
German: Besonders aktiv (sehr harte Belastung/Sport oder eine körperliche Arbeit)

Notes: "Fast" is a nominalized verb? y / n (e.g. German "das Fasten")
For glances, indicates that a fast is active
Something like the local version of "8h"
Something like the local version of "8 min"
Something like the local version of "8s"
